00021 #ifndef GAMESTATE_H
00022 #define GAMESTATE_H
00023 
00024 #include "PlatformEngine.h"
00025 
00026 /**********************************************************/
00044 class GameState {
00045         public:
00046                 GameState();
00047 
00048                 //** Prepares state subsystems and scripts.
00049                 virtual void Init() = 0;
00050 
00051                 //** Cleans up any remaining state assets.
00052                 virtual void Cleanup() = 0;
00053 
00054                 //** Halts execution of the state's operations.
00055                 virtual void Pause() = 0;
00056 
00057                 //** Resumes state execution.
00058                 virtual void Resume() = 0;
00059 
00060                 //** Handles any events that are particular to the state
00061                 virtual bool HandleEvents(  PlatformEngine* game,
00062                                         SDL_Event& event ) = 0;
00063 
00064                 //** Updates the state's logic
00065                 virtual void Update(        PlatformEngine* game ) = 0;
00066                 
00067                 //** Draws the visual content of the state to the engine. 
00068                 virtual void Draw(          PlatformEngine* game ) = 0;
00069                 
00070                 //** Explicitly Switches the engine to another state.
00071                 void ChangeState(       PlatformEngine* game,
00072                                         GameState* state ) {
00073                         game->ChangeState( state );
00074                 }
00075 
00076 
00077         private:
00078                 bool running;
00079 };
00080 
00081 #endif
